components.description:
A person bowing deeply which is known as dogeza in Japan. Used to express a sincere apology, or to request a large favour.

Many variations of this emoji are misinterpreted as a person doing push-ups, lying down to have a massage, or doing a cute "head resting on hands" gesture.
components.title: Person Bowing Deeply

description:
A person bowing deeply which is known as dogeza in Japan. Used to express a sincere apology, or to request a large favour.

Many variations of this emoji are misinterpreted as a person doing push-ups, lying down to have a massage, or doing a cute "head resting on hands" gesture.
title: Person Bowing Deeply

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

bn:00097970a: Feeling or expressing regret or sorrow or a sense of loss over something done or undone

bn:00098708a: So lacking in interest as to cause mental weariness- Edmund Burke- Mark Twain

bn:00101571a: Afflicted with or marked by anxious uneasiness or trouble or grief.
Afflicted with or marked by anxious uneasiness or trouble or grief

bn:00110036a: Feeling mentally uncomfortable because something is missing or wrong.
Experiencing or showing sorrow or unhappiness- Christina Rossetti

bn:00097488a: Carefully observant or attentive; on the lookout for possible danger
Watchful, especially for danger or disorder; alert; wary

bn:00106354a: Of, relating to, or denoting a member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that perform the fertilizing function in generation

bn:00109738a: Marked or characterized by respect; as, respectful deportment.

bn:00088732v: To express something by a gesture or gestures.
To say or express through gestures.
Show, express or direct through movement
To show, express or direct through movements.

bn:00092903v: Not move; be in a resting position

bn:00083370v: To have or hold as a (personal) opinion; judge; think.
To have as opinion, belief, or idea.
Judge or regard; look upon; judge
To account; to esteem; to think; to judge; to hold in opinion; to regard. (Source Webster 1913)
To have as an opinion; to consider, suppose.

bn:00083405v: To bend, or cause to bend, as in humility or fear.
Bend one's back forward from the waist on down
To bend the upper part of the body forward and downward.

bn:00090326v: (For a human or animal) to assume a horizontally extended position on a surface.

bn:00050613n: Time free from work or other duties; spare time.
Time available for ease and relaxation
Leisure, or free time, is time spent away from business, work, domestic chores, and education.
Time free from work or duties.
Time that is freely disposed by individuals
Leisure, or free time, is time spent away from business, work, and domestic chores.

bn:00012569n: A boy is a young male human, usually child or adolescent.
A young male person, usually a child or teenager.
A young male human; a male child or young adult.

bn:00021461n: Remorse is an emotional expression of personal regret felt by a person after he or she has committed an act which they deem to be shameful, hurtful, or violent.
A feeling of regret or sadness for doing wrong or sinning.
A feeling of deep regret (usually for some misdeed)
Remorse is an emotional expression of personal regret felt by a person after they have committed an act which they deem to be shameful, hurtful, or violent.
A pricking of conscience or a feeling of regret, especially one which is slight or fleeting.
Feeling of regret or sadness for doing wrong or sinning.

bn:00052968n: Determined sex of an animal. Use Q6581097 for a male human
A member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A person who belongs to the sex that cannot have babies
A male organism is the physiological sex which produces sperm.
An animal of the sex that has testes.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00040336n: The use of movements, especially of the hands, to communicate familiar or prearranged signals
A gesture is a form of non-verbal communication or non-vocal communication in which visible bodily actions communicate particular messages, either in place of, or in conjunction with, speech.
Form of non-verbal communication or non-vocal communication
A quick movement of a finger or pen on a screen that the computer interprets as a command, rather than as a mouse movement, writing, or drawing.
The use of movements (especially of the hands) to communicate familiar or prearranged signals

bn:00018345n: A pickpocket; a young or petty thief.
A piece or strip of potato that has been (usually deep-fat) fried and is commonly eaten with or as fast food.
A young person of either sex
A person not legally of age, or who is younger than may be charged with an offence
In law, a minor is a person under a certain age -- usually the age of majority -- which legally demarcates childhood from adulthood.
An account holder who is a family member, but not a parent, and who has limited use of the Internet. Children can view their own settings, but they can't change them.
A person who is too young to be considered legally competent according to the laws of a jurisdiction.
Age of majority, Legal age, Infancy
A person who is below the legal age of responsibility or accountability.
A person below the age of puberty.
A person who is below the age of adulthood; a minor .
